scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --config rollup.dist.config.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs build/erddap-parser.js -c -m -o build/erddap-parser.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/erddap-parser.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/erddap-parser.js build/erddap-parser.min.js
